name: Horse Tale - Adventure Quest
description:
Saddle your horse and be ready to ride it as long as possible completing various quests and missions! Dip into the atmosphere of medieval surroundings galloping through the wild forest, wide plains and picturesque cities and just have fun playing Horse Tale - Adventure Quest!

Complete various missions from feeding your truly horse to fighting with the powerful rivals! Check different types of missions and become the most powerful horseman of these lands! Deliver letters and mail boxes to the right points, take as much quests as you can and just try to survive in this picturesque but inhospitable medieval world! Let the adventure begins!

Become a horseman exploring the wild medieval nature and hunting such wild animals as wolves, foxes, bears and deer! Be attentive and careful not to fall into a trap of cruel and artful bandits and don’t forget to feed your horse in time, otherwise it could die and your game would be over! Improve your horse riding and fighting skills being a brave medieval horseman and just enjoy Horse Tale - Adventure Quest!

Earn points for successive mission completion and unlock new interesting skins for your horseman to look like a courier, scout, mercenary or a real knight! Power your characteristics up and become the most skillful medieval rider ever!

Horse Tale - Adventure Quest features:
• Fantastic horse riding quest game
• Various types of interesting quests
• Chance to customize your horse rider
• Exciting atmosphere of medieval period
• Realistic 3D graphics

Become the medieval horseman galloping through the wild forests, wide plains, quiet countryside and loud cities! Fight with bandits, deliver mail and just have fun playing Horse Tale - Adventure Quest!
